CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function 'disconnect' is vulnerable to OS command injection. The 'config.iface' parameter is concatenated directly into the command string without any sanitization or escaping. This means that if a user can control the 'config.iface' parameter, they can inject arbitrary OS commands to be executed.
